name: BareBones MVC
body:
### Welcome to BBMVC.
An extreamly light MVC framework that is written in Haxe that you can use for your Actionscript, and other cross platform Haxe projects.

### Easy install.
If you have haxelib installed then open up a terminal window and type **$> haxelib install bbmvc** . 
Now you can add it to your hxml file **-lib bbmvc** and you should be good to go.

### Actionscript Example
If you would like to use BBMVC in your Flex or Actionscript projects it's pretty simple. I've provided an  [Actionscript example ](https://github.com/matthewswallace/BBMVCExampleProject.git) to help you get started. 

**IMPORTANT** After you have grabbed the source code for BBMVC github page you will want to grab the **bbmvc.swc** out of the build directory and drop it into your Actionscript project in order for it to work.
tagline: A extremely light MVC framework built in Haxe.
